lines.text: I scream. You scream. We all scream. For ice cream.
You always makin' big plans for tomorrow. You know why? Because you always fuckin' up today.
[first lines]
Julie, what're you doing out here?
Just watching the light change.
I "ham" a good egg.
Very strange mother, my mother.
And now i have falled in love, at last. I have finded my new home. She has asked to me if I stay here, to live together with her forever and ever. Like in a book for children.

[looking through his book of English phrases]
If looks could kill, I am a-dead now.
My mama used to say that America's the big melting pot. You bring it to a boil and all the scum rises to the top.
Not enough room to swing a cat... Cat. The animal.

[to Zack, who is drawing on the cell wall]
Hey, cut it out!
[Zack disobeys]
*Stop it*! Man, doncha know it makes time go slower? Cut it out!
[they start fighting]
Fuck you...
If looks can kill, I am dead now.
My father, no. He's very strong, but with the rabbit he is afraid.
It is a sad and beautiful world.
Yeah, it's a sad and beautiful world buddy.
You know, Jack, we could make some money together. Except you're always blowin' it. You know - gambling, gettin' high, showing off.
I gotta have fun, you know, baby ?

Yeah, yeah, I know. You're always makin' big big plans for tomorrow, and you know why ? 'Cause you're always fucking up today ! Look at that white girl, that Julie you started out with, she's all messed up now. All your girls are so messed up - except me. I can tell a lot of things about you. Some things you'd never put into your head. But you can't be so sure. My mom used to say that America is like a big melting pot, because she used to say that when you bring it to the boil, all the scum rises to the top.
[she laughs sarcastically]
So maybe there's still hope for you yet, Jack.
[she suddenly stops laughing]
You listening to me ?
[short pause]

Shit. You don't understand any kind of people. Maybe that's your problem. You sure don't understand women at all. And a pimp is supposed to know about women. If you was a good pimp, you'd have hit me by now, you'd have done something. But I can just lay here, and talk forever, and you won't hear a single word. Like you don't even speak english ! You're lost in your big big plans, but I know about you, Jack.
This is how you dressed before you were in the joint, right? Sort of garbage man on parade.
You, uh, plannin' on doin' a little squirrel huntin', Jack?
Zack ! Hey man ! What the fuck ya doin' here in the garbage ?

[without looking at Preston]
Just leave me alone, Preston. I'm in a bad mood.
Then I'm just the man you've been looking for. In fact, I've been looking for you.
That's a bad sign.
Now, Zack , baby ! I got somethin' real good for you. An hour's work for a whole lotta scratch.
I ain't interested.
Then you ARE in a bad mood. You won't even let me propose it to you ! Can you just listen to me for one minute, will ya ? One minute of your, uh... valuable time ?

[sighs in exasperation]
Just fuck off, Preston.

[chuckles and acts like he's going to walk away from him, but then goes back to him]
All I wanna do is pay you a grand, in exchange of a single hour of your very very valuable time. But this ain't no break in, no delivery of controlled substances, none of this stuff. It's just to drive a car, from one part of town to another, alone. That's it.
What kind of car will that be, Preston ?
That will be a very nice car. A very nice, very expensive imported car, which just happens to be in between owners at the present time.
[mutters to himself]

Look man, all you gotta do is drive the car across town, park it, leave it. I can pay half grand upfront, and the other half later. The whole thing's over in an hour! It's very safe, very clean, and believe me, i can get a million guys to do this for me.
Then why don't you do it yourself ?
I'm offerin' a grand so I don't have to answer stupid questions like that.
Well... I might consider the grand upfront... then I might think about it.
Jesus !
[a pause]
Zack... you are in a nasty mood. So just to cheer you up a little bit, I give you 750 upfront. OK ?
[Zack rises to leave him on the spot but he holds him back]
Alright, alright, Mr. All-Mighty-Hot-Shit. I'm gonna do you this favour.
[he gives Zack the keys of the car]

[impressed, but still muttering to himself]
Oh man ! A Jaguar !
I'll give you the whole thing upfront
[he gives Zack the money]
Now you owe me.
[long pause]
Zack, you know you can buy yourself twenty girls for all of that ?
If you were a good pimp you would've hit me by now!
I am a good egg. Jesus.

[to Zack]
Because you... because you don't take care of me... ya don't want me... ya don't wanna make any fucking commitment to me... I'VE *FINISHED* WITH YOU, ZACK! I've completely *finished* with you! Why doncha just go find some other li'l girl... I mean... that shouldn't be too difficult for you! I'm FED UP with you and YOUR FUCKIN' STUPID RADIO SHOWS!
